textBox.richText: “Hey Guys! So the Environmental Council is going to arrange a food audit starting from next Monday and we need people who are willing to be food recycling monitors! Basically we’re trying to gather information on the amount of food people in this school wastes everyday, so we can make graphs and do fancy stuff with it. You get EAG points for being a monitor and for Y12/13, you get CAS minors if you do it for more than 1 break!!!!!!! Basically, as a monitor, you just stand there in front of a food bin andd make sure people throw food waste
